channel.title: The Sarlacc Pit: Digesting the Star Wars Galaxy
channel.description: The Sarlacc Pit is the oficial podcast of GalacticBinder.com. Released every 2-3 weeks, it is the Star Wars podcast for the fans! Come join us as we digest the latest news and happenings from the Star Wars universe.
channel.itunes:summary: The Sarlacc Pit is the official podcast of GalacticBinder.com. Released every 2-3 weeks, it is the Star Wars podcast for the fans! Come join us as we digest the latest news and happenings from the Star Wars universe.

item.title: Episode 75: What We Want to See From Episode 7
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt and Chris as we discuss all the Star Wars news going on. Celebration VII, Star Wars Marvel comics, Star Wars Rebels and much more. Our main topic this episode looks ahead at Episode VII and what we want to see from this movie. So grab your remote control and settle in for another great episode of the Sarlacc Pit.

item.title: Episode 74: You Stupid Lump
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt and Chris for another episode of the Sarlacc Pit. This episode we talk Star Wars News like: Empire magazines top 301 movies, the stand alone movies and much more. Sit back as our main topic this week is "Interactions between R2-D2 and C-3PO". So grab your R2-D2 bobble head and join us in the Pit.

item.title: Episode 73: May the 4th Be With You
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join and Matt and Chris as we are back from our vacation and ready to talk some Star Wars. Listen in as we talk about the Episode VII cast reveal, how the EU is unfolding and things that make you go hmmm. Plus our main topic is "funniest lines". So grab your May the 4th t-shirts and join us for another fun episode of the Sarlacc Pit.

item.title: Episode 72: Palpatine... Good... Good
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt and Chris as we welcome back Mark P. from Yodasnews.com. February is a BIG month for Yodasnews. Listen in to find out why. On this show we tackle news about Star Wars Rebels, Yodasnews, Gary Oldman and is Darth Vader really the chosen one? Plus stay tuned as we discuss our favorite Palpatine/Sidious/Emperor moments.

item.title: Episode 71: Plot Holes
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt and Chris as we come back after a month off and deliver a really cool show. We welcome back Karl from The Wampa's Lair podcast, and we review the year in Star Wars news. We also discuss things that make you go Hmmm like, "Who really killed the Lars Family". For our main topic we take a good look at some "plot holes" in the Star Wars Saga. So grab your Wampa action figure and join in on the fun.

item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com

item.title: Episode 68: Underrated Contributors to Star Wars
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt and Chris as we welcome Consetta Parker back on the show to talk about the big news of Rancho Obi-Wan getting into The Guinness Book of World Records. Also we talk some JJ Abrams, casting news, Ep VII title and more. For this show's main topic Matt and Chris sit down and take a good look at a group of guys who are considered underrated contributors to Star Wars. So grab your Guinness Book and join in on another great episode of the Sarlacc Pit.

item.title: Episode 65: Joe Corroney in The Pit
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Matt "The Krankster" and Chris "Hothiceplanet" welcome a very special guest, Star Wars artist Joe Corroney, to our show. Join in as we talk to Joe about his work in comics, art and all things Star Wars. We touch on news about George Lucas winning an Emmy, a big casting call going out and Star Wars on 3-D Blu Ray? We have a great main topic for this show - our Top 5 Overrated Star Wars characters from the films. So grab your Star Wars lists and join in on a great new episode of the Sarlacc Pit.

item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com

item.title: Episode 57: McQuarried a Second Time
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Matt "The Krankster" and Chris "Hothiceplanet" are back together for another fun episode of the Sarlacc Pit. This episode we welcome John Scoleri of Ralph McQuarrie's website. Join us as we discuss Ralph's beloved artwork, Star Wars 1 comic and the fact that the live action TV series may still be in the works. Our main topic for this show is on our favorite Star Wars artists. So grab you paint brushes and join in on the fun.

item.title: Episode 56: Holidays in the Pit
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: While Chris "HothIcePlanet" Smith is putting the finishing touches on his book, Join Matt "The Krankster" Krienke on a special holiday edition of the Sarlacc Pit Podcast as he welcomes special guest Mark Newbold of Jedinews.co.uk, Joe Hogan of joehoganart.deviantart.com, and Terry Cooper from the Save the Lars Homestead project as they discuss Star Wars and the holidays. Matt also talks The Clone Wars, the future of Star Wars and we hear from you, the listeners as well and much more. So sit back, relax, grab some imperial egg nog and enjoy the show!

item.title: Episode 55: 2nd Annual Star Wars Music Video Festival Winners
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt "The Krankster" and Chris "Hothiceplanet" as we discuss more on the Disney and Lucasfilm merger. We look at some of the rumors and what will be coming over the next couple of years. Oh yeah, plus we announce our winners of the 2nd Annual Star Wars Music Video Festival! So grab your FX Lightsabers and join us for another fun episode.

item.title: Episode 49: Han Solo
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt "The Krankster" and Chris "Hothiceplanet" as we do a show by ourselves for once. Yup, no guests join us on this episode! On this episode we discuss Comic-Con, as well as Hasbro, Gentle Giant, Sideshow, Dark Horse offerings and more. We get in to some updates on "Trivia From A Galaxy Far, Far Away" and the "2nd Annual Star Wars Music Video Festival". Lots of fun stuff to talk about. For our main topic we have a little twist on our popluar "Top 5" lists. This time around we are discussing our favorite Han Solo quotes from the Saga. So grab your mp3 players and join us for another cool episode of the "Sarlacc Pit".

item.title: Episode 48: Top 5 Scenes of the Original Trilogy
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt and Chris Hothiceplanet and we welcome a very special guest Cris Macht of "The Force Among Us" fame. This episode we talk news, including Kathleen Kennedy, Star Wars1313 and the Clone Wars, and we announce our winner of the Gentle Giant giveaway. We have updates on Leia's Journey for Princess Leah and the "Trivia From a Galaxy Far, Far Away" kickstarter project. Also in Star Wars in pop culture segment we have a record setting auction from Profiles in History. Plus we get all the scoop on what Cris is doing with "The Force Among Us II". For a main topic we discuss our Top 5 scenes from the Original Trilogy. So grab your laptops and join us for another great episode in the Sarlacc Pit.

item.description: Join Matt and Chris (Hothiceplanet) for a HUGE episode of the Sarlacc Pit. This episode we welcome Tom and Jay again from TheUnknownRegions.com podcast. They join us in discussing the Savage Opress story arc and other news, including Hasbro's Vintage Action Figure Wave 5. We get an email from Susan Bowes, author of Star Wars fan fiction, Malignant Metamorphosis. This episode's topic is on the movie that started it all, Star Wars Episode IV A New Hope.

item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt and Chris Hothiceplanet as they welcome Riley and Bethany Blanton of the "Bothan Report" podcast. This episode we look at the Year in Star Wars. From Star Wars in 3-D to video games, from books to comics and from Robot Chicken to Family Guy we look back at the year of 2010.

item.title: Episode 16: Christmas in the Sarlacc Pit
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: It's Christmas time in The Sarlacc Pit. Matt and Chris (Hothiceplanet) welcome our special guests, Pete Svab of galacticbinder.com, Mike Kearney (soon to announce a new Star Wars website) and Riley Blanton from the SoloSound network of podcasts and co-host of the Bothan Report podcast. Join all of us as we discuss the Clone Wars Savage Opress screenings and touch on the Robot Chicken Star Wars special airing Dec. 19 on Adult Swim. Listen in on our main topic as we go down memory lane and remember some of our fondest memories of Star Wars Christmases past.

item.title: Episode 15: Favorite Characters
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt and Chris Hothiceplanet for the latest episode of the "Sarlacc Pit". In this episode we talk over the latest news and read listener emails. We are joined by our special guest Mark Cox of Save the Lars Homestead Project. Listen for details on how to win some of your very own Tatooine sand courtesy of the Save the Lars Homestead Project! We also discuss our favorite Star Wars characters and why. Don't forget to send in your Star Wars Christmas stories and we near our "Sarlacc Pit" Christmas special.

item.title: Episode 13: Sounds of Star Wars
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: Join Matt and Chris Hothiceplanet as we discuss the usual new topics and emails. Listen in for details on how to win your very own copy of the book, "Millennium Falcon: A 3-D Owner's Guide" from Scholastic Books and Big Honcho Media. We also give details on how your can contribute to our upcoming Christmas podcast. Plus, we have a very, very special guest in Dan Madsen of Her Universe and other Star Wars fame. This episode we discuss the sounds of the Star Wars galaxy. So bring in your Kadu from the ranch and join us for a cool episode of the "Sarlacc Pit".

item.title: Episode 1: Welcome to The Pit
item.itunes:author: GalacticBinder.com
item.dc:creator: GalacticBinder.com
item.description: On our debut episode, we welcome to the show Pete Svab, creator of GalacticBinder.com. We discuss the latest news from the online Star Wars universe including the The Force Unleased II and Star Wars: The Old Republic cinematic trailers, some Star Wars hijinx at a Minnesota college and a cool Star Wars adidas crossover. We also cover Star Wars in popular culture (movies, television and music) as our first in-depth topic.
